product_name: Salomon XA Pro 3D Ultra CS WP Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Salomon XA Pro 3D Ultra CS WP trail-running shoes handle all-terrain running, thanks to aggressive traction, waterproof protection and responsive support. Breathable and lightweight polyester mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays to secure insteps and lock heels down; protective toe and heel caps provide protection. Lacing system takes just 1 pull for an exact fit; lace pocket hides lacing away. ClimaShield(TM) waterproof breathable membranes keep the water from rain and puddles out of your shoes without sacrificing breathability. Polyester linings wick moisture away from feet; contoured Ortholite(R) foam footbeds enhance comfort underfoot. Dual-density EVA midsoles deliver enhanced durability and cushioning for all-day comfort. Thermoplastic urethane midsole inserts supply protection and stability. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the Salomon XA Pro 3D Ultra CS WP trail-running shoes deliver sure traction on mixed terrain.
short_description: The Salomon XA Pro 3D Ultra CS WP trail-running shoes handle all-terrain running, thanks to aggressive traction, waterproof protection and responsive support.
